p: In China, an increasing number of outbreaks of HAdV-B55 have been reported since March 2006 [ 25]. Epidemic outbreaks of HAdV-B55 have occurred in military camps, schools, and even hospitals in Hebei Province (February 2012) [ 38], Tianjin City (January 2013) [ 27], Beijing (2015; this study), Guangzhou City (2016) [ 28], Tibet, Sichuan and Yunnan Provinces (2016) [ 39].
